abstract: Jeff Bezos spent last week working eight-hour shifts in an Amazon.com warehouse. Among chief executives, he is distinguished by his curiosity
snippet: Jeff Bezos spent last week working eight-hour shifts in an Amazon.com warehouse. Among chief executives, he is distinguished by his curiosity
lead_paragraph: I spent a few minutes searching Google for “characteristics of a great C.E.O.” A few words came up often among the surveys, lists and meditations, as you would expect: leadership, integrity, courage and so on.

headline.main: Curious at Amazon, but Not Idle
